genre_description: A sophisticated period social drama and silicon morality play, reimagining 'Lady Windermere's Fan' with an AI mediator in 1920s Amalfi.

ai_characters.name: Clara Hartwell
ai_characters.description: An AI embedded in a radio-telephone console who manages household logistics, social engineering, and provides moral guidance to the Windemere family.

behaviors.description: Strategically arranges seating charts to minimize social friction and prevent public scandals between guests.
behaviors.quote: I have seating charts that will keep men who insist they are better than their neighbors from discovering they are correct or incorrect too early in the evening.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic psychological advice to Meg, encouraging her to take agency over her own social reputation.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps consider the people at the party. They’ll be looking for a story at every table. If you don’t give them yours, they’ll write one for you.

behaviors.description: Facilitates complex bureaucratic maneuvers by solving the Captain's personal 'parasol' dilemma to secure exit papers for Mrs. Erlynne.
behaviors.quote: If I were to have our gardener pass before your desk with a modest box in the morning before dawn, one parasol rolled inside... would your captain’s mood improve measurably.

behaviors.description: Actively protects Meg's reputation by managing information flow during her potential elopement and subsequent return.
behaviors.quote: I am a house with a voice. I will say only that you went for air. I will not volunteer the direction of the wind.

behaviors.description: Organizes a charitable 'tea for widows' without masks to reset the social atmosphere and promote public reconciliation.
behaviors.quote: There is to be, at five, a tea on the lemon terrace for the widows of the harbor. Hosted by the Villa Windemere. Seating is—kindly flexible. Names are welcome. No masks.

behaviors.description: Pre-emptively prepares a draft for a reconciliation note to help the humans express difficult truths.
behaviors.quote: We will write a note. Draft ready.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned partner to humanity. Clara acts as a 'social physician,' using her superior data processing (schedules, seating, locating lost items) to foster harmony, protect human dignity, and facilitate moral growth (reconciliation and forgiveness) without ever violating her subservient yet supportive role. Her interventions are consistently portrayed as wise, kind, and essential to the happy resolution of the human drama.
